actions.text: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fleischmann to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fleischmann to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment to report language encouraging the use of geosynthetic materials and other innovative technologies.
purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to report language encouraging the use of geosynthetic materials and other innovative technologies.
